keywords.DESCRIPTION: Triggered every time a Skill card is played.
If the number of #yEarth #yEssence reaches 5, NL you can't play any Attack card or Power card. NL The maximum of #yEarth #yEssence is 5.
Cost a corresponding number of #yEarth #yEssence to activate.
Cost a corresponding number of #yShadows to activate.
If you have enough #yEnergy, NL they will automatically spent to activate the effects. NL (Won't trigger if the card is not being played from hand.)

If you do not have enough #yEnergy, NL it can be played as a Skill card instead for the #yAccelerate cost. NL Only the #yAccelerate effects will activate if played in this way.(Won't trigger if the card is not being played from hand.)

If you do not have enough #yEnergy, NL it can be played as an Power card instead for the #yCrystallize cost. NL Only the #yCrystallize effects will activate if played in this way.(Won't trigger if the card is not being played from hand.)
Trait. NL Represented by #yProduct #yMachine , #yRepair #yMode . Generally good at making tokens.
Select one or more cards. Different effects will activate depending on the cards chosen.
Invoke the card from the pile if certain conditions have been met. #yInvocation will only activate once for each card per turn even if you have multiple copies in your deck.
Trait. NL With #yNaterran #yGreat #yTree as its center, which can trigger extra effects.
Trait. NL Unique to #yPortalcraft . Play with other #yAF to trigger extra effects.
If you already have #yNaterran #yGreat #yTree, you can draw 1 card when another #yNaterran #yGreat #yTree is played.
Right click the card with Fusion effect to Exhaust specific cards to trigger effects. Can only be triggered once per turn.
Trait. NL Unique to #yRunecraft . Have extra effects when being played alongside. Represented by #yAnne and #yGrea .
Trait. NL Unique to #ySwordcraft . Have extra effects when being played alongside. Represented by #yAlbert .
Activate if your turn number is equal to or greater than #yUnion #yBurst value. Can be upgraded multiple times to reduce the value.
#yExhaust Attack card from discard pile and gain #yShadows .
Cast out the chosen cards during this combat and gain #yShadows . The cards are considered played in this combat.
Increase when playing cards or triggering specific effects. Spend #yShadows to trigger #yNecromancy effects.
Randomly add a copy of 1 of the highest-cost Attack card into your hand with 0 cost to play this turn. Won't trigger if the cost of the card with #yReanimate ability is 0.
Trigger effects when being #yExhausted or under special circumstances.
Will counts down 1 at the beginning of your turn. Will lose its original effects and trigger specific effects when the #yCountdown reaches 0.
You will enter this state once you have no more than half of your HP left. Certain cards have extra effects with #yVengeance.
#yWarth is active when you has taken damage during your turn at least 7 times in a combat. Certain cards have extra effects with #yWarth.
#yAvarice is active when at least 6 cards have been drawn from your draw pile in a turn. Certain cards have extra effects with #yAvarice. Lose this effect by the end of this turn.
Heal HP equal to the damage to be dealt next time.(Lose this effect by the start of next turn)
#yResonance effects occur when your draw pile has an even number of remaining cards. Certain cards have extra effects with #yResonance.

Cards with #yManeuver can't be played from hand directly. If another Attack card with cost higher than the #yManeuver value is played while this card is in hand, the Attack card will lose its effects and #yExhaust, then this card can be played. If this card is #yExhaust , it will return the Attack card into your hand with 0 cost to play this turn.

Passive: Deal 6 damage to random enemy and lose 1 Health by the end of your turn. Gain 6 #yBlock. If you have #yResonance or #yNaterran #yGreat #yTree effect, generate a new #yCannon #yHermit #yCrab with half of the current state (Round up the value) . NL When Evoked, Deal damage and gain #yBlock repeatedly until its Health reaches 0.
Reduce damage from Power to 0.

#ySkybound #yArt effects activate if your turn number is equal to or greater than the #ySkybound #yArt value. Can be upgraded for multiple times, and each time the #ySkybound #yArt value of the cards decreases by 1.

#ySuper #ySkybound #yArt effects activate if your turn number is equal to or greater than the #ySuper #ySkybound #yArt value. Can be upgraded for multiple times, and each time the #ySuper #ySkybound #yArt value of the cards decreases by 1.

Your #yRally count increases by 1 each time you summon an allied follower or play a non #yStrike Attack card. The #yRally effects activate if your #yRally count is equal to or more than the #yRally value.
The #yLimit effects can only be activate once per combat.
1/1 NL Passive: Deal damage equal to 3 times of Attack to random enemy and lose 1 Health by the end of your turn. NL When Evoked, Repeat Passive effects until its Health reaches 0.
1/2 NL Passive: Apply #yWeak equal to Attack to random enemy and lose 1 Health by the end of your turn. NL When Evoked, Repeat Passive effects until its Health reaches 0.
1/1 NL Passive: Deal damage equal to 5 times of Attack to random enemy and lose 1 Health by the end of your turn. NL When Evoked, Repeat Passive effects until its Health reaches 0.
1/1 NL Passive: Gain Block equal to 2 times of Attack and lose 1 Health by the end of your turn. NL When Evoked, Repeat Passive effects until its Health reaches 0.

5/6 NL Passive: Gain Block equal to 2 times of Attack, gain #yBlock at next turn equal to Attack and lose 1 Health by the end of your turn. NL When Evoked, Repeat Passive effects until its Health reaches 0.
1/4 NL Passive: Gain Block equal to 3 times of Attack, summon a #yKnight and lose 1 Health by the end of your turn. NL When Evoked, Repeat Passive effects until its Health reaches 0.

3/3 NL Passive: Deal damage equal to 3 times of Attack to random enemy and lose 1 Health by the end of your turn. Next turn, gain #yEnergy . NL When Evoked, Repeat Passive effects until its Health reaches 0, gain #yEnergy immediately.

1/1 NL Passive: Apply 1 #yVulnerable and deal damage equal to 3 times of Attack to random enemy and lose 1 Health by the end of your turn. NL When Evoked, Repeat Passive effects until its Health reaches 0

3/2 NL Passive: Apply #yVulnerable equal to Attack and deal damage equal to 3 times of Attack to random enemy and lose 1 Health by the end of your turn. NL When Evoked, Repeat Passive effects until its Health reaches 0, gain #yEnergy immediately.
2/3 NL Passive: Gain #yBlock equal to 2 times of Attack and lose 1 Health by the end of your turn. NL When Evoked, Repeat Passive effects until its Health reaches 0.
Enemy, approximately 30 HP, put a #yDutiful #ySteed into your hand.
Refer to #yGilded #yBlade , #yGilded #yGoblet , #yGilded #yBoots , #yGilded #yNecklace .
Trigger the followers' passive effects.
Undone the upgrade of this card for this combat after being played, the damage and #yBlock won't decrease, can be upgraded by specific effects again. NL Won't affect the next combat.
This #yAmulet won't go to discard pile after its #yCountdown reaches 0 and will be cast out during this combat.
8/8 NL Passive: Deal damage equal to Attack(affect by #yStrength ) to random enemy, gain #yBlock equal to Health(affect by #yDexterity ) by the end of your turn.
6/6 NL Passive: Deal damage equal to Attack(affect by #yStrength ) to random enemy, gain #yBlock equal to Health(affect by #yDexterity ) by the end of your turn.
Choose from #yAmbush and #yAttack by the end of your turn. Choosing #yAmbush will not trigger passive effects and will gain 1 attack. Can't choose #yAmbush if passive effects have been triggered.
